means: 不腐败的，不被收买的，纯洁的

sentence.Network_en: The qualities of loyalty, discipline, justice, incorrupt, civilization have the connection of the law.
sentence.Network_cn: 警察院校学生品德中“忠诚 、 纪律 、 正义 、 廉洁 、 文明”中具有法的内涵.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(69) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... incorrigibly 不能矫正地 incorrupt 不腐败的 incorruptibility 不腐败.
考博英语单词3000g-z - 豆丁网 ... incorporate v． 结合， 合并 incorrupt a． 纯洁的； 正直的； 廉洁的 incur v． 招致， 惹起； 遭受.
incorrupt cultural construction is the combination of cultural construction and incorrupt construction , and also a new-style cultural construction .摘要廉政文化建设是文化建设和廉政建设相结合的产物，是近年来催生出的一种新型的文化建设。
incorrupt的意思 a. 不腐败的;不被收买的  incongruously是什么意思 ad. 不调和地  arch action怎么翻译拱圈作用,拱作用  arch brick的中文解释拱砖,楔形.

list.abs: High source of integrity , impartialand incorruptible ., 高源刚正不阿 , 铁面无私.

Texaco , an oil giant now subsumed by Chevron , had such an incorruptible reputation that African border guards were said to wave its jeeps through without engaging in the ritual shakedown .现已并入雪佛龙的石油巨头德士古，曾有廉洁的名声，据说以至于非洲的边境警卫让他们的吉普车顺畅通行而不是通常的勘路拦截。
theory and practice on incorruptible culture construction in universities ., 高校廉政文化建设的理论与实践.
enterprise incorruptible management is the objective requirements for precautions against commercial bribery .企业廉洁经营是预防商业贿赂的客观要求。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin incorruptus, from in- 'not' + corruptus 'destroyed, marred' (see corrupt)

sentences.sentence: "a policeman who was incorrupt and incorruptible"
